item.title: Graffiti located on a wall (Arnold Estate), 16th December
item.description:
Outline of graffiti is present. Early removal is recommended to prevent it being filled in and to reduce further antisocial behaviour. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 142-179, Sweeney Crescent, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TV and Garden Waste Dumped, 16th December
item.description:
A TV has been dumped on top of garden waste (twigs, branches, etc.), creating a messy and potentially hazardous area next to the lockers on Arnold Estate. Please arrange removal and proper disposal.Thank you .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 142-179, Sweeney Crescent, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
